title: The Writer's Almanac - Tuesday, July 13, 2021
description: Today we remember the birth in 1793 of the English Poet John Clare. A success in his own time, success could not save him from a life of madness.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today we remember the birth in 1793 of the English Poet John Clare. A success in his own time, success could not save him from a life of madness.
